title: Gallery | Gunners recover ahead of Spurs
body_text:
Fresh from yesterday's shootout win over Spurs, our women's first-team squad headed back to the gym to prepare to face our north London rivals again this weekend.
There were plenty of smiles in the recovery session at London Colney as Vivianne Miedema, Beth Mead, Noelle Maritz and more got ready for our last game in 2023. We face Spurs at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium this Saturday, with kick-off set for midday.
Click through our gallery below to see our squad in action:
